data:
Dubravka Rupnik Instructor Ph.D., 1994 - Louisiana State University 366 Nicholson Hall, Tower Dr. (225) 578-8400-Office rupnik@phys.lsu.edu Experimental Nuclear Physics My expertize is in the area of research in experimental nuclear physics. I colaborate
                     with researchers and educators from other colleges and universities. I helped design
                     new courses and curricula. I am ineterested in exploring innovative educational technologies.
                     I am involved in the development and implamantation of programs to improve the teaching
                     and learning of physics, particularly class demonstartions and experimental modern
                     physics lab. Educational Research Meetings Gordon Research Conference on Physics Research and Education, Electromagnetism, June 11-16, 2006, Mount Holyoke College, South Hadley, MA
